data.message: My activity log will not load on a business page that I manage. It only displays posts from October and will not load for September. I see the posts in my videos and checked to make sure this all worked last week... Now its not loading for some reason and I have tried on multiple computers. I need to unhide a post immediately for my business. Please help!

replies.message: I have tried all of the tips in the "Help" community forums, please do not direct me to those. I am running a lot of ads from this page and need it fixed immediately.
Hi Bianca. For questions about Pages and Ads on Facebook, please reach out to our team at: http://bit.ly/2dHyqDM. -Jessica
Facebook Thanks! I did, need someone to answer soon. Thought I'd try here for a quicker response.
